data.prayer: the county of Nadia has (about) 56,844 people who know Jesus, 62,700 people who know about him culturally, and 5,048,056 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nadia, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 56,844 believers in Nadia to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 5,167,600 souls in Nadia and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 56,844 believers find a person of peace today among the 5,110,756 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Sardar (Muslim traditions) people.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Nadia, West Bengal, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Nadia are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Nadia, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

location.name: Nadia
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Vaidik, Brahmin Utkal, Rajput Banaudhia, Amat, Angarok
